text: The women's 1500 metres event at the 1998 World Junior Championships in Athletics was held in Annecy, France, at Parc des Sports on 31 July and 2 August. ==Medalists== {| class="wikitable" style="text-align:center; " width="35%" |- |bgcolor="gold"|Gold|| Lan Lixin ' |- |bgcolor="silver"|Silver|| Yimenashu Taye ' |- |bgcolor="CC9966"|Bronze|| Bouchra Benthami ' |} ==Results== ===Final=== 2 August {| class="wikitable sortable" style="text-align:center" |- !Rank !! title: 1998 World Junior Championships in Athletics – Women's 1500 metres
